channel.title: Cool stuff on spawning. delta
channel.description:
hi, im making a barrows mini and im making it so when you click the coffin the guy spawns or you get a message saying youve found a tunnel, ive got the spawning and tunnel message working i was just wondering if any1 knows of a way to: 1. make the npc attack you on spawn. 2. make the npc say something on spawn.
any help is appriciated Smiley thanks.

item.title: Cool stuff on spawning. delta
item.dc:creator: @TheMyth TheMyth
item.description:
@TheMyth wrote:

ok ive looked through the base for ages, i cant find any way of making it auto attack or say text on spawn, and i already thought of making the npc aggressive, it doesnt work because it just attacks any player, i need it to attack the 1 that opens coffin.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 31, 2008, 07:01:12 am[/size][hr][quote=“Mrs Extro Limited, post:4, topic:240232”]both of you don’t know shit if your with winterloves servers.[/quote]

we’re using delta… if you dont have anything constructive to say then dont say anything at all.

Read full topic

item.title: Cool stuff on spawning. delta
item.dc:creator: @TheMyth TheMyth
item.description:
@TheMyth wrote:

[quote=“pwnedurmom, post:2, topic:240232”]“Dude, I’m soo goodd at coding! I can make you a full barrows with a out a problem.” Did you not know i was a member of this forum?!

eat your words fool, and rofl aggressive npc code much? it’s that simple, as foor the say somthing… maby a ?

if statement saying if chest opened send text “rawr” only one time lets see if I can’t do it. lol[/quote]

blair ive made ALOT of things in this that you cant even start to understand, npc spawning is about the only thing im not familiar with in delta lol.

Read full topic
